reviews.text: Thank God for Dr Pulitano.  I phoned his Office Manager Sabrina, the day after I was told I had stage 4 liver metastases.  She was helpful and reassuring.  Dr Pulitano met with me and my husband very soon thereafter and he was professional, patient and compassionate.  Unfortunately, I was initially inoperable but that did not stop Dr Pulitano and Sabrina from acting as my advocates and communicating with the incredible team of doctors and nurses taking care of me at Chris O’Brien Lifehouse.  It was nearly a year later after many cycles of chemotherapy that I was deemed operable.  Dr Pulitano was there for me throughout this time.  The surgery I had was extensive and very high risk but I went into it well informed and confident that I could not have a better team than the one Dr Pulitano had at RPAH.  The surgery has gone well and my prognosis is greatly improved thanks to the talent and courage of this surgeon.  Having worked in medicine, my family and I both realise what a blessing it is to be under Dr Pulitano’s care.

I am incredibly grateful for the exceptional care provided to my dad by Dr. Carlo Pulitano and his team, Sabrina Jose. Dr. Pulitano's expertise and compassion made us feel confident and well-informed throughout my dad's procedure. Sabrina was always responsive and handled our questions efficiently and with kindness. Thanks to their exceptional service, my dad’s surgery was a success, and his recovery has been smooth. We highly recommend them!

From first contact with the lovely Practice Manager Sabrina my experience with the clinic has been exceptional, with the staff really going above and beyond. Customer service was outstanding and nothing was too big of an ask, I was able to get an appointment promptly and the whole process was smooth and easy. A/Prof Pulitano is very clearly an expert in his field, he gave me plenty of reassurance and was a wealth of knowledge. I walked away from my appointment feeling confident in his care and with his explanation of the findings confident with the management of it all. Will definitely go back if required in the future and wouldn’t hesitate to recommend him to those needing review.

What a calming, generous and professional surgeon Dr Pulitano is. His Practice Manager Sabrina is also so helpful and responsive. Their kind approach and the care of the Chris O’Brien Lifehouse staff has corrected some of my past trauma from surgical experiences. Thank you so much for looking after me.

A wonderful human being - a true professional.

Could not be happier with the result and care from Dr Pulitano re a complicated hernia operation.

Would most heartily recommend him to any prospective patient.

A/Prof Apostolou - clarity, care, compassion and convenience.
I struggled with pain and nausea and a whopping gallstone that I didn't know was there till it had to come out.
Clear, concise and calm consultation, a strategy for remedy and the options put precisely to me.
Got the gallbladder out and got my digestive health back on track in quick succession.
Seek immediate guidance for issues if they come to pass as preventative treatment or surgery can solve complications that may arise if left undiagnosed or untreated.
Thanks for your decency, diligence and decisiveness to help me over a health hurdle.
Highly Recommend Christos as a first choice surgeon in his fields of excellence and generally a great caring doctor.
Regards

From the very first consultation, A/Prof Christos Apostolou’s expertise, professionalism, and warm bedside manner were evident.

He took his time to explain everything in detail, answered all my questions with patience and clarity, and ensured I felt comfortable and informed, on the day of the procedure he continued his great bedside manner!

His calm and compassionate approach truly sets him apart—he not only delivers outstanding surgical care but also genuinely cares about his patients as people. I felt confident and reassured throughout the entire process thanks to his kindness and attention to detail.

I can’t thank A/Prof Christos Apostolou enough.

If you are looking for a highly skilled Doctor with an exceptional bedside manner, look no further!

A/Prof Apostolou is not just a delightful, down-to-earth doctor, he is a great surgeon. He played a very important role in a recent complex, multi-surgeon operation that I required and I am so happy that I was referred to him.
thank you for your kindness and skill.

Dr Apostolou is an extremely competent, professional and experienced surgeon.
I was anxious about my surgery but always felt reassured and confident after consulting with him. He was always thorough and detailed with his explanations of my options and the details of the surgery and recovery.
My result was excellent and I highly recommend him as a caring and excellent surgeon.

Prof. Apostolou performed my hernia repair surgery. He is a very professional and experienced surgeon. He is friendly and explained the details of the procedure and what to expect during the recovery very well. I am fully recovered now and simply I do not have words to thank him - Thank you Prof Apostolou!

You won’t find a better, more caring and professional Dr than Dr. Michael Hii. He has now operated on my mother, husband and myself and we have all never felt better.

Michael provides necessary information relevant to individual situations to help the patient make informed decisions.

His true care for patients is undeniable. We are so very grateful for what he has done for our family.

I had an incredible experience with Dr. Michael Hii and the entire team. From the first consultation to post-op follow-ups, I felt fully supported, informed, and cared for. The surgery was life-changing, and I’m already seeing amazing results in both my health and confidence. The professionalism, compassion, and expertise made all the difference. Highly recommend to anyone considering weight loss surgery!

It has been 6 months since Michael performed my surgery at St Vincent’s and I have lost 40+kg. I sleep better and have more energy to work and play with my grandchildren.

If you want something you have never had, you need to do something you have never done!

It’s changed my life!!

I never thought I would ever be able to walk into a clothing store and buy something off the rack without having to go to a big man’s store. I enjoy clothes shopping and feel great when I wear new clothes.

I couldn’t have asked for a better surgeon. Michael provided the level of explanation and information I wanted, while also listening to my history and providing realistic outcomes without sugar-coating (Actually no sugar at all anymore). He is supported by a brilliant team for all pre and post-op requirements. If I need to be cut open again in a similar capacity, Michael will be my first choice.

This is the best thing I have ever done for myself, I have felt very supported through the whole process.

Dr Michael Hii and his wonderful team have made this Weight Loss Surgery an exceptional experience.

The operation has given me my confidence back to be the best version of myself and I am  truly grateful to Dr Michael Hii and his whole team for always believing in me and guiding me through this journey.

Thank you for never being judgmental when it comes to my weight-loss/fitness journey!

Your encouragement means so much. I have never felt more better or more confident in myself in my own skin than how I feel now!

The team have been my constant cheerleaders during this journey you have all been my biggest support!!

There is no shortcut to loosing weight , you need to go to war with your body and your mind to make it happen!

My heaviest 127.5kg vs at my best 62.5kg

Total loss 65kg 16 months post gastric sleeve

I have had the most amazing experience with Dr Michael Hii. I had my gastric sleeve 5 weeks ago. After trying other surgeons Michael was by far the best. He is compassionate, friendly and very professional. My experience has been faultless with him and his nurses and he has my total trust along with lots of other people I know who have had surgery with him.

Dr Oliver fisher is the best, Dr Fisher had to perform surgery on my Oesophagus in November 2023  but he found Cancer in my stomach which he had to remove and made a stomach out of my small intestine, ( Unbelievable ) how clever is that and I got the all clear diagnosis from my Oncologist yesterday 17-12-24 there’s no sign of cancer , Cheers Geoff,👍🥰❤️🇦🇺 P.S. Thank you Dr Oliver Fisher.

Very happy with procedures Dr Fisher did to repair lateral lumbar hernia. I have not felt as well as I do now for last 12 months. He is a wonderful surgeon. Kind, caring and took time to fill me in on all details of surgery. Excellent follow up. Gave me great confidence with moving forward. Also like to express how grateful I am to Corrine, Dr Fishers receptionist. At every point she was so supportive, engaging, caring and eager to help with appointments and any other area I need help with. Thank you so much.

My GP recommended that I see Dr Oliver Fisher for an opinion. I usually leave medical appointments feeling dejected because no one likes being sick right! I have sometimes felt powerless, unheard and time pressured during consults with other specialists, and on occasion I've felt like I was just a money making exercise for the professional in the chair.
Dr Fisher blew me away. He is none of that. I left my appointment feeling truly cared for. He took so much time going through all my options -  what was so refreshing was that he communicated with me, not just talked at me. He listened, he was honest and gave both the pros and cons,  he was thorough with information and made sure to cover all aspects of the topic. He is kind, engaging, compassionate and I suspect an extremely talented individual. His other glowing reviews about his skills are surely not doubted by me after experiencing the quality of being he is. I think the greatest outcome of my introduction to be treated by him is that I feel...safe.  I don't think I've ever felt instantly safe in a strangers hands before. I'm confident that whether further scans reveal I need surgery or not,  I am confident that if I do go under the knife, my life is safe in his hands and I will be well looked after. Highly recommended and I wish more Drs had the qualities he lives and breathes.

I can’t say enough about Dr Fisher I had a sudden gallbladder attack I was sent to him by my GP who said he was a great Dr , well he wasn’t wrong Dr Fisher cam to see me as soon as I was admitted in to St George private he ran through everything with me so kind and made me feel at ease explained everything he was going to do . Dr Fisher talked me through the process before operating and what needed to be done. Had scans , bloods done and before I knew it Dr fisher was back to give me results and next steps I can’t speak highly enough of him as normally you don’t see your surgeon until your back in theatre. I saw Dr Fisher 3 times before surgery . Also I would like to mention his team and assistant Coreen who was very helpful at organizing me into the hospital at such short notice all that I can say Great hands to be in .
Thank you so much . Best hands to be in .

I don’t think words in any language could truly express how grateful I am for Dr. Fisher. His professionalism, support, compassion, and care have meant more to me than I can explain. I’m deeply thankful.

Due to complications with the Private Health System in Canberra, my surgeon referred me to Professor Talbot. In July of last year, I underwent a full gastric bypass performed by Michael and his surgical support team. Throughout each stage of the process, Professor Talbot and his team exhibited exceptional professionalism, expertise, and care. The surgery was highly successful, leading to significant improvements in my quality of life and health. Professor Talbot's skill and precision were evident during the entire procedure, and his compassionate approach made the experience considerably more manageable. I am profoundly grateful for the transformative impact of the surgery and highly recommend Associate Professor Michael Talbot and his entire team to anyone considering weight loss surgery. His dedication to patient well-being is truly commendable.

It's not easy making the decision to have bariatric surgery. All the information out there can be overwhelming. My biggest challenge was who to trust to do this surgery. I'd seen a few, before I was referred to AProf Michael Talbot. The difference. He treats you like a person, not a patient, and certainly not some faceless number. His down to earth honesty and guidance, made my journey a much easier one. Many specialist bog you down with technical talk. Dr Talbots explanations made sense and alleviated any concerns I had. This was my first ever major procedure and going into theatre I wasn't scared, I was excited for my new life to begin.
Thanks Mike I'm so happy to be going through my journey with you.

Professor Michael Talbot performed upper gastro surgery on my hiatus.
I'm very happy with the outcome and would recommend him to anyone.
He is very personal and professional.
Gordon Hunter

I am now 14 months post weight loss surgery and Dr Talbot was my Surgeon.
Without a doubt, he is the best.
I have had no issues, recovery was good and I continue to lose weight.
There are cheaper Surgeons around but no-one better and I would urge anyone considering weight loss surgery to go with Dr Talbot as you will not regret it.
The old saying of you get what you pay for certainly applies.
All in all best decision for my health I have ever made.

I had a revision Gastric Sleeve to Gastric Bypass 12monthe ago… I’m extremely happy with Proff Michael Talbot and other treating Drs and staff in his surgery. He explains everything very clearly so you understand. He treats you with respect and is very easy to talk too. 100% caring, friendly professor I say. Wish I had of had Proff Michael Talbot for my Gastric Sleeve at the beginning. Highly recommend this Proff for any surgery to do with Upper GI issues. 😉

I really enjoyed working with Alex throughout the surgery process. I felt prepared going in, mentally strong for recovery and supported all the way along. Advice was tailored to my personal experience which I appreciated.

So happy that Alex and this clinic was recommended to me. From my initial consultation where he explained the procedure comprehensively and answering all my questions to post operation support has been outstanding. I feel supported by the friendly and caring team. Best decision I've ever made and would highly recommend Alex and this clinic.

Alex has been great with me and has a gentle kind approach whilst being knowledgable and professional towards me. Ahmed did my surgery, but Alex has been handling the post op process. I did have a few hiccups, but we have fixed everything up and now all has been successful.

I find Alex to be honest, down to earth in approach and realistic. He's patient when I have a screaming child in the background and understands his patients needs.  He breaks down and explains procedures, and processes which are otherwise overwhelming to understand. Highly recommend.

i have huge respect for dr alex craven, one of the most solicitous specialists i have encountered. his comprehensive pre-surgery briefings were an excellent and comforting preparation for a major operation to remove a tumour from my oesophagus, and his enthusiasm for what he does is wonderful to behold.

My experience with Dr Das was exactly what I look for in a Dr, he was professional in every way, very easy to talk to, I’m a person who likes to know exactly what’s going on, he answered every question I asked and added other information I needed to know, very informative, he spoke to me as an equal which I greatly appreciate.
A lovely man.
Along with his very lovely staff who were also very easy to talk to and more than happy to help in anyway.
Thank you for making my surgery as easy and comfortable as possible.

I cannot thank Dr Das enough for his level of care, he listened to me and my health concerns. We set a realistic deadline and he and his team helped me get there. My bariatric surgery was the best decision I’ve ever made for my health and wellbeing and he has given me my life back.
All my consultations with Dr Das, Katie my dietitian, Kerrie and the admin team right through to the beautiful staff/nurses that took care of me at Southwest Sydney Private Hospital as Dr Das’ patient has been the best experience.
Thank you all for your amazing service and level of care, it’s been an awesome journey for me in the last 16 months.
If you’re considering bariatric surgery Dr Das and his team are where it’s at. This is by far the best weight loss tool I’ve been equipped with.

Got referred by multiple people including my GP to Dr Das. From day one to recovery Dr Das and his staff were helpful and caring. Followed up with phone calls after surgery to see how I was progressing. It was obvious Dr Das was on the ball and is an expert in his field. After Gallbladder surgery my life has changed for the better. Thank you Dr Das and the staff!

I recently had gallbladder surgery performed by Dr Das, prior to the operation he explained the procedure and advised me on things to do to aid my recovery. He was polite and respectful.
Following my surgery and whist I was in recovery he rang my wife to advised her that the operation went well and there were no complications. Se was greatful for the call. I highly recommend Dr Das,

Exceptional Care and Professionalism - Highly Recommended

I cannot speak highly enough of Dr. Amitabha Das and his entire medical team. From the moment I walked into the clinic, I was impressed by the warm, welcoming atmosphere and the professionalism of every staff member.
Dr. Das is truly outstanding - he combines exceptional medical expertise with genuine compassion for his patients. He took the time to thoroughly explain my condition, answered all my questions with patience, and made sure I felt comfortable throughout the entire process. His attention to detail and comprehensive approach to care gave me complete confidence in his treatment plan.
The nursing staff and support team are equally impressive. They were attentive, efficient, and always went above and beyond to ensure my comfort. The administrative staff made scheduling appointments seamless and were always helpful with insurance questions and follow-up care coordination.
The facility itself is modern, clean, and well-organised. Wait times were minimal, and the entire experience was smooth from check-in to discharge. It's clear that Dr. Das has built a practice centred on patient care and excellence.
I would recommend Dr. Das and his team without hesitation to anyone seeking quality medical care. They truly set the standard for what healthcare should be - professional, compassionate, and patient-focused.

Dr Bouffler has helped me change my life. I’m at the early stages and I know that up until the end I will always be forever grateful for her coming into my life. The staff are amazing and I can’t fault any of them. Thank you so so much.
Professional doctor. Thanks you look after me.

Dr. Clement Tsang is truly amazing !!
I had a laparoscopic inguinal hernia repair on 15 April 2025, and the entire experience was excellent. Dr. Tsang and his team was incredibly professional, reassuring, and highly skilled throughout the whole process. The surgery went smoothly, and my recovery was quick and trouble-free.
I highly recommend him without hesitation.

I had a gastric sleeve and hiatus hernia repair with Dr Tsang and I couldn't be happier with the care I have received. In addition to his excellent surgical skills and proven track record he has been very responsive to my many questions and I feel like I have been given all the information that I need every step of the way. Thank you Dr Tsang

Dr Tsang is awesome!
Couldn’t recommend him more for lipoma removal.
He is very knowledgeable and personable.

I had a fantastic experience with Dr Tsang for the removal of sebaceous cysts on my scalp. I'm leaving a review as I found it so difficult to find a doctor in Sydney with positive reviews for this procedure. Dr Tsang is a great communicator, patient and easygoing. The whole procedure was over before I knew it, pain free and the incision is tiny (plus he didn't have to remove any hair so it's barely noticeable on my scalp!) Would highly recommend Dr Tsang for anyone looking to have a cyst removed.

Since 2022 I have had a Gastric Sleeve , Hiatis Hernia Repair ,Umbilical Hernia Repair and Gallbladder Removal all without any complications.
Dr Tsang is a great surgeon and I highly recommend him.

I recently had surgery for a hernia and a water cyst removal from the canal of Nuck, and I can't recommend Dr. David Links enough! From start to finish, Dr. Links was fantastic, very knowledgeable, caring, and made me feel at ease. The surgery went great, and my recovery was very smooth
So down to earth and for my gallbladder removal, I felt like I was in excellent hands.

Wonderful, caring surgeon.
Very skilled.
Highly Recomnend

After having emergency surgery last year, this year I needed to have a follow up surgery to fix a complex large hernia and some other complications from the prior surgery. After meeting with other top surgeons in Sydney they all advised me David was the best option for this surgery. After a few consults and a plan I felt very comfortable with David and his team doing the surgery. David and his team visited me every day in hospital. A few weeks post surgery I had a small complication I emailed his team and David called me with antibiotics within a few hours which fixed the issue. If you need a highly trusted upper GI surgeon in Sydney I would not hesitate to use David and his team. He is compassionate, very calm and very quick to respond to anything you need.

Dr David Yeo is an empathetic surgeon who seems highly regarded by both his patients and his colleagues for his expertise in managing various conditions affecting the upper gastrointestinal tract. His team (Monika- Practice Manager and Rosa- Secretary) are fantastic and have been very helpful.

Dr Yeo, was very informative. I was out of hospital before 24hr were up. The whole team is very professional & polite. Best hospital stay ever. They made a difficult time enjoyable. Thank's to all of Dr Yeo's, team & all the lovely nurses in the TPU.
I can't thank you enough.

I cannot express enough gratitude for the exceptional care I received. The doctor made me feel completely at ease, creating a comfortable and reassuring environment. His expertise is truly remarkable—he took the time to understand my situation in depth and skillfully put all the pieces together in a way no one else had. His dedication, compassion, and insight go far beyond expectations. I genuinely believe he is the best in his field and deserves to be ranked #1. If there were an option to choose him for every specialist service I ever needed, I wouldn’t think twice.

Not only was the medical care outstanding, but the reception team was equally incredible. Their professionalism, efficiency, and exceptional communication made everything smooth sailing from start to finish. From scheduling to correspondence, every detail was handled seamlessly, adding to an overall stress-free experience.

I am beyond thankful for this level of care and would highly recommend to anyone in need of top-tier medical expertise.

I am thrilled to share my experience with Dr Yeo and his team for the second time in four years. From the moment I arrived at the office, I was greeted warmly by Monika the Office Manager, who made the check-in process smooth and hassle-free. Their professionalism and friendly demeanour set a positive tone for the entire visit.
Dr Yeo is a standout in the field of Upper GIT. He took the time to thoroughly explain my diagnosis and discuss all possible treatment options, ensuring I was well-informed and comfortable with the next steps. Their expertise and compassionate approach made a significant difference in my care.
The combination of Dr Yeo medical expertise and Monika’s excellent office support created an environment of confidence and comfort. I felt genuinely cared for every step of the way, from the initial consultation to the follow-up visit.
I highly recommend Dr Yeo!

We are incredibly grateful to Dr Kaushal for the exceptional care and surgical expertise provided to my mother-in-law during her complex gangrenous gallbladder removal. It was a high-risk case, and we were deeply concerned, especially as she was visiting from overseas. Dr. Kaushal not only performed the surgery with great skill but also ensured a smooth and steady recovery.

His professionalism, clear communication, and genuine care made a world of difference to our family. The support and reassurance he provided throughout the process was outstanding. Thank you for giving her the best chance at recovery and treating her with such kindness and expertise.

Highly recommend Dr. Kaushal to anyone in need of skilled and compassionate surgical care.

Very lucky to be in the hands of such a competent, caring and thorough Doctor. A very successful anti-reflux surgery and couldn’t be happier with the outcome! It wouldn’t have been possible without the kindness and efficiency of his wonderful secretary Jamiee. You are both amazing humans that have continuously complemented each other throughout my care over the years and I have always felt extremely valued. Thank you both!
Dr.Devesh was very good. He was very kind, professional and very helpful throughout the whole process of my gallbladder removal. Would definitely recommend him to friends and family

I had the privilege of being treated by Dr Kaushal and I can confidently say that my experience exceeded all expectations. Dr Kaushal’s expertise and skill are evident in the result and I am beyond pleased with the outcome.
I am incredibly grateful for the care I received and would recommend Dr Kaushal to anyone seeking surgical care.

Dr Kaushal is an excellent surgeon. He did an amazing job looking after my mother while she was sick. He was kind and empathetic throughout a very difficult time for my family. He was extremely thorough and made sure to keep us updated of any changes. I have recommended him to my extended family and friends and will continue to do so.

I had a small lipoma on my back and was recommended to Dr Lim by my regular GP. Following our appointment he gave me a public and private health option with the private fee very reasonable. We undertook the surgery at Northpark Private and everything was well done. From appointment to removal was less than 4 weeks, and I'd highly recommend Dr Lim.
Excellent Doctor and Surgeon, caring, considerate and highly skilled, can absolutely recommend

I’m sure Dr.  Khaleal Is a great surgeon, but he certainly needs to take Better care in diagnosing.
I came to Dr. Khaleal After having a positive ultrasound result for a hernia. He had a look at me and said he was confident I didn’t have a hernia despite the ultrasound showing that, But instead, had a muscle tear.
I spent the next few months being on light duties at work and doing physio to treat this so-called muscle tear. It became adamant that after Six months of this and still no progress I got another ultrasound which showed my hernia has grown and I got referred to a new surgeon who operated and fixed it. I am lucky that this was all through workers comp otherwise, it would’ve been a massive financial stress for me, But it still was so impeding and prolonged.
I would hate for someone else to have the same experience as I did.
Terrible practice - needs new, adequately trained doctors. Nothing special about Fadel Khaleal.

I had my lapband and sleeve performed by Dr Khaleal. 10 years with lapband and then he removed it and performed the sleeve on me. Best ever. Thank you for giving me my life back! He makes you so comfortable and knows his stuff.  He knew what was good for me, even if I didn’t. Thank you.

Dr. Fadel Khalil has a developed mentality and aspires to always be better and this is what distinguishes his work. I am proud that I cooperated with him and he performed a successful surgery. I wish you success in all your life

Amazing service from the receptionist, she was very helpful as well as very well organised when it came to booking an emergency appointment for me. Doctor Fadil Khaleal was one of the best surgeons I’ve witnessed in western Sydney, he was very professional and got straight to the point.

Dr. Reza performed a laparoscopic surgery for my husband a few months ago after he was admitted through Emergency. He was extremely professional with amazing bedside manners, and patiently answered our many questions—both before and after the surgery. He walked us through every step from beginning to end. His clarity in explaining the situation, while also taking the time to ensure we fully understood everything, gave us great confidence. We are deeply thankful for his expertise and compassionate care.

Dr Reza performed my urgent and unexpected gallbladder removal. He was professional and caring and I felt completely safe in his care. My recovery has been exceptional. I would highly recommend Dr Reza to anyone, he is brilliant.

I first met Dr Reza when I was in the emergency department and again later when I was admitted. Under his care, my issue was monitored and treated successfully. At all times he  kept me informed of the current situation and what the next steps were. Once discharged I had to book a procedure which Dr Reza performed. He is a great surgeon and he genuinely makes an effort to ensure you understand everything. I would highly recommend Dr Reza.

I am incredibly grateful to Dr. Faizur Reza for the outstanding care he provided to my father during an emergency. He operated on my Dad late at night, and despite the urgency, he remained calm, kind and extremely professional throughout. He was very humble and genuine.
The surgery was a complete success, and the follow - up care was just as impressive. He consistently checked in and made sure everything was progressing well.
A special mention also to Mrs. Charlotte..his medical secretary, who was exceptionally kind and prompt in answering all our calls and queries. Her efficiency and politeness made the entire experience even smoother.
Highly recommend Dr. Faizur Reza!

Dr. Reza is a professional in laparoscopy surgery. Both he and his team clearly communicated the process of my appendix removal. My successful surgery and rapid recovery is a testament to Dr. Reza’s exceptional skill. My scars have been recovering well thanks to his care and gentle work. Dr. Reza’s outstanding work extends to the care and communication offered post-surgery where he came to my room in the very late hours of the evening to explain how the surgery went and the findings which alleviated all stress. He then followed up with another meeting the next morning to provide photos of this findings and further explain my next steps towards a full recovery. Overall, Dr. Reza was an exceptional surgeon and doctor from start to finish with my appendix removal. Thank you!

It took me 2 years to finally make the decision to get the gastric sleeve, from the moment I met Dr James Chau I felt comfortable and confident that he was a very experienced, humble and kind specialist. Moving on now and I'm 5 months post op and can guarantee that my first impressions were right, Dr Chau has been wonderful and helped give me guidance throughout and was extremely professional and caring pre and post op.
Anyone sitting on the fence I 100% recommend going with Dr James Chau

I met with Dr Chau over a year ago on a consultation for gastric sleeve. From my first appointment with Dr Chau i was drawn to his expertise his persona and professional advise. I booked with him to have my operation June 2021. I am very happy with the outcome Dr Chau visited my twice a day in the hospital to check up on my recovery and I was overwhelmed by his daily visits and his caring and humble natural to all his clients. I am so happy I had been referred to by another friend that had the same procedure done over 3years. I have had no complications and almost a year since my gastric sleeve and i have lost 50kgs. I have been seeing Dr chau and his dietician every 3 months since my operation and his always welcoming, friendly, supportive and always shows alot of empathy and interest in his clients. My family GP says I am a success story that needs to be shared. I highly recommend Dr James Chau to anyone who is looking of having weight loss operation. I am the happiest I ahve been in along time and I am glad I chose to have the gastric sleeve. It has changed my life forever and I will be forever grateful and thankful to the Dr James Chau.

Kind Regards
Patricia Finney Wollongong NSW

So I was on the sideline thinking if I should inquire about the surgery with my GP… thank god I did. Dr.Chau has been so amazing and supportive from the first consultation to being in the hospital and then the 2 visits a day while in hospital and the follow up consult at 4 weeks and the 3 month one already booked in. I can not recommend him enough. His staff on the phone and so helpful and encouraging and remind me when I almost forget the time I’m due in. If you are not sure if you should do the surgery or your trying to choose a surgeon…can I please highly recommend Dr. James Chau!!!!

Post op 5 days after a gastric sleeve operation and removed a nasty hernia.
So much thanks and appreciation to Dr Chau and team on my surgery and hospital stay.🙏
Not a great start to recovery , but awesome care and reassurance for the next few weeks time.
I leave the Hospital with confidence to return to the bush for rest and more recovery ❤️‍🩹 at home.

I had WLS July 2021 and couldn't be happier. Dr Chau and his team are so supportive, compassionate and informative.

I am now a very healthy weight and living life to the fullest.

Thank you Dr Chau and team, you are genuinely life savers 😁😁😁

Where do I start? GAME CHANGER!
My surgery last year was performed by Dr Jason Maani and I would like to publicly express my happiness and health change to all!
I was a depressed 155kg LAZY I hate the world attitude type of person, after years of life on horrible take away diet.
I finally decided to have the sleeve surgery. Firstly I hate attached my photos below,  and I’m pretty sure you can agree and notice the 58kg weight loss my progress pics that I look at for motivation regularly and shake my head in shame and promised never to go back to the unhealthy lump I was.
Dr MAANI may god bless you and your fantastic staff!!! My life couldn’t be better and my overall health is so much better!!
Anyone who is thinking of doing it please please read my blog. Highly recommend to all who are overweight and the main focus is health and spending time with my beautiful family!!!!!

The sleeve surgery completely changed my life! Thank you Dr Maani for giving me the opportunity to become a healthier, happier me .
I did the surgery exactly a year ago and I have lost 40kg! That was 100% of my body fat gone!
I highly recommend Dr Maani for the sleeve surgery, he explained exactly what was going to happen and how .He also answered every single question I asked and explained it in detail to make sure I understood.
He made it very easy and comfortable for me thoughtout the whole journey
Best thing I’ve ever done in my life !! Thank you again Doctor !

March 2018 I decided to see Dr Maani about weight loss surgery.

May 2018 I had bariatric surgery.

It has been the best decision I have ever made with the guidance of Dr Maani and his team was and still is sensational. His personal approach is fantastic and so supportive.

12 months on and 80kgs loss!!!

I am happy that Dr Maani has pointed me in the right direction. Every question that I asked was explained properly and he made sure that it was understood.

Don't think twice if you are struggling with obesity and speak to him. This man has definitely saved my life and I will be forever thankful.
